title: Vibrant Geometric Abstraction

style_attributes.composition: Dynamic geometric shapes arranged in a balanced asymmetrical composition

prompt_used: Abstract geometric composition with vibrant colors, dynamic shapes, and balanced asymmetry
description: This sample abstract artwork demonstrates the type of geometric abstraction that inspires our ArtBot. It features bold, vibrant colors and dynamic geometric shapes arranged in a carefully balanced composition.
inspiration_value: The color relationships and compositional balance in this piece exemplify the aesthetic direction we want to explore with ArtBot.
